evidence: There’s also an important parameter here called D. This is the distance from the fan-beam vertex-that is, the source position-to the center of rotation of the sample.
Fan-beam function in MATLAB allows us to simulate this geometry directly, bringing us closer to how modern CT scanners actually operate.

concepts.term: By sweeping through all these angles, we collect the fan-beam projection data needed for reconstruction.

evidence: X-rays don't travel in parallel lines like before. Instead, they spread out in a fan shape from a single point called the beam vertex.
